item.title: Why Projects Should Have “What’s New” Documents
item.description:
Description

Describes the speaker's experience writing What’s New documents covering the new features in each Python 2.x release. The editorial policies will be summarized, and the speaker argues that large projects should include a “What’s New” as part of their standard documentation set.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Kuchling

item.title: Computer Recreations or, Rediscovering the 80s for Programming Fun
item.description:
Description

In this talk we'll be discussing the SciAm Computer Recreations columns as a source for examples and interesting things and how to use these interesting examples to teach Computer Science."

  • Andrew Kuchlin
item.dc:creator: Andrew Kuchling
